product_name: The North Face ThermoBall Vest - Men's
long_description: The North Face ThermoBallTM vest for men puts revolutionary new ThermoBallTM synthetic insulation to work. Warm and light, it mimics the best of down, yet still insulates even when wet.
short_description: The North Face ThermoBallTM vest for men puts revolutionary new ThermoBallTM synthetic insulation to work. Warm and light, it mimics the best of down, yet still insulates even when wet.
